data.title: The best affirmation app
data.content: Honestly - this app has lifted me up in all the best ways. The widget reminders are my favorite- and honestly? This affirmation app is my go to when I am feeling down.
data.author: Lunaluvenigma

data.title: I Am FTW 🫶
data.content: This app has truly saved my mental health in so many ways, on so many days. It seems to pop up in just the right moment when I really need that reminder to keep going, and the messages seem to resonate perfectly. ✨A genius app for those who need mental health affirmations. 💛 As someone who has struggled with MH since childhood, I am so grateful for this little app. I tell everybody about it! A giant thanks + kudos to the developers!🫶✨ Side note: as a Mama of a 5yo + 3yo, and also a 2nd grade teacher…I’d love to see one specifically for kids. Building healthy self talk young and confidence is soo important! 💕
data.author: vtgirl11

data.title: So helpful!!
data.content: I am so grateful for this app! I started using it, begrudgingly, at the invitation of a friend who was already using it and finding it very helpful in her life. I was an affirmations naysayer, but have become a convert 😆 One thing that I would love to see is the addition of parenting affirmations. I’m a single mom and it’s hard out here for us! Gentle reminders to give ourselves grace would be so wonderful.

data.title: I love it
data.content: It’s always a right on time type of word
data.author: queenqua29

data.title: Love this app
data.content:
I’ve had this app for a few years and I just love it. I’ve been in recovery from burn out and this (among other things) really helped!! And I keep it because it keeps me on the right track. 
I highly recommend to all.
data.author: Ama Zarate

data.title: Quality app
data.content: There’s lots of apps out there we tell you what this is the real deal. This app is a brain changer game changer.  I’m so thankful it’s here. I love this app. It’s helped me so much. Thank you I am.
data.author: str8ner11

data.title: Absolutely… duh.. just buy it
data.content: I only pay for two apps: My period tracking app and my affirmations app because they are equally as important to me. This app will alter your brain in the most beautiful way. Thank you. Grateful for this app really. It’s helped a lot with my depression, anxiety and self-esteem issues
data.author: Christinakilamb

data.title: So good!
data.content: I wish I could like the affirmation w/o the app trying to open but this is a great way to keep your mind positive. I’ve had three friends and my daughter add it - it’s SO much easier to remember to do your affirmations if they are on your Lock Screen. Love it!

data.title: Widget broken AGAIN
data.content: I love this app and love the custom widgets to match my aesthetic. HOWEVER… with every update the widget stops working properly so now it’s the generic widget not personalized and isn’t the theme I chose. It also notifies me of streaks I don’t actually have all the time. I pay for this app and it’s constantly getting screwy.

data.title: Idk what happened
data.content:
I was on the free version, then something popped up to get a year for 17.99, so I had to go update my payment info. When I clicked on the app again though, there was no option to do that sale again. When I tried deleting it, downloading it again, it won’t let me use the free version at all anymore.

So now I have no more positive affirmations on my Home Screen.

data.title: Make it make sense
data.content: I genuinely love the daily/hourly affirmations! They tend to come at the right times and the messages are always great! However, if I have the notifications turned on, why in the world am I being prompted to “Tap to keep getting reminders”??? LEAVE IT ALONE. THROW AWAY THE IDEA OF FORCING PEOPLE TO TAP TO KEEP GETTING REMINDERS. Please consider this review and make the changes.

data.title: Good but could use a few updates!
data.content: I really like this app so far. But if I could change a few things I would add a section to save your favourite backgrounds so you don’t lose them in the large variety (I love having options just wish I could find my favs easier). I would also make a spot for requests on types of affirmations (I know I could email but I’d rather shoot a quick message). Like I’d love some focusing on self trust but when I search that not much comes up.

data.author: Delilaha345

data.title: I’m a paying customer and this app hasn’t worked for 6 months
data.content: This is my first review ever. I really loved this app when it worked. But for the last 6 months I’ve been receiving no notifications on my iPhone 13 mini, running the latest software on both the app and my phone. I’ve contacted technical support about this, provided robust technical details about my device and app, and I have repeatedly been told that it’s a planned fix in a future update. However, there have been about 40-50 app updates since my initial request, and the only notifications I receive are to “Keep my streak alive!” I didn’t want to write this review. But if you’re going to be a paying customer, you should be aware of this. Thanks for reading.
data.author: MellowToastCloud
